document.full_text: divisions in hamas have been brought to the surface by a reconciliation agreement with rival group fatah, exposing splits in the palestinian islamist movement that could complicate implementation of the deal.
document.title: palestinian unity deal exposes divisions in hamas
lines_and_colors: divisions in hamas have been brought to the surface by a reconciliation agreement with rival group fatah, exposing splits in the palestinian islamist movement that could complicate implementation of the deal.
